title: Switch to importlib breaks scripts with `app.run()`
raw_output: Issue 5160 reports that switching to importlib breaks scripts that use app.run(). The fix involves both scaffold.py (where import handling happens) and helpers.py (helper utilities). Predicted files: (1) src/flask/scaffold.py - import/module resolution logic. (2) src/flask/helpers.py - helper functions affected by the importlib switch. (3) CHANGES.rst - changelog entry for the bug fix. (4) tests/test_basic.py - basic tests. Exploration: Both scaffold.py and helpers.py are involved in the importlib migration. Added helpers.py per special instruction.
